title: eConceptual: MS/MD/DNB/SS Exam
description:
eConceptual: Your gateway to Conceptual Orthopedics, Conceptual Surgery, Conceptual Anesthesia, Conceptual Radiology, and Conceptual OBG. 

eConceptual is the world's first application for clinical & surgical online training to Medical Post-Graduates MS / MD/ DNB / DO / DMRD Resident Doctors, budding Surgeons, Clinicians & Practitioners.

eConceptual for MS / MD / DNB / SS Exams | Gold Standard For Residency Programmes

Dr. Apurv Mehra, a leading Orthopedic Surgeon & renowned National & International Faculty of Orthopedics dreamt of creating this unique App with a vision to build a learning platform where the biggest legends from the Best Medical Institutes would join hands and provide to all medical Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners - the best clinical & surgical training, required skill sets, latest techniques, procedures and updated knowledge to excel in their residency with the help of innovative teaching methods taught by expert faculty, and cutting-edge resources to create a truly immersive learning experience.

eConceptual App is a platform that hosts:

Conceptual Orthopedics – World’s No 1 Online Training App for Ortho Post-Graduates, residents and practitioners.

Conceptual Surgery – World’s No 1 Online Training App for Surgery Post-Graduates, residents, and practitioners.

Conceptual Anesthesia - World’s No 1 Online Training App for Anesthesia, Post-Graduates, residents, and practitioners.

Conceptual Radiology - At Conceptual Radiology, learn the skills of tomorrow. Online Platform for MD / DNB / DMRD Radio Residents & Budding Radiologists.

Conceptual OBG / Conceptual Obgyn - The ultimate destination for OBS-GYN residents and practitioners seeking to enhance their skills and knowledge for a successful career in obstetrics and gynecology. 

The aim behind eConceptual is to provide standard training to MS/ DNB Resident Doctors enthusiastic to understand clinical & surgical skills right from THE BASICS, building strong concepts and keeping them abreast with recent advances.

To provide you with the best training, the biggest legends, leading clinicians & surgeons with excellent academic backgrounds have come together to share the most valuable assets - their knowledge, experience, and achievements earned over years of dedicated Clinical and Surgical practice.

Distinguished educators like Prof. Dr. S.M. Tuli, Prof. Dr. Sudhir Kumar, Prof. Dr. Anil Dhal, Prof. Dr. Shantharam Shetty, Prof. Dr. V.B. Bhasin, Prof. Dr. Arun Kakar, Prof. Dr. R C M Kaza, Prof Dr. Vinod Malik, Prof Dr. Satish Aggarwal, Prof. Dr. Rakesh Garg, Dr. Geeta Kadayaprath, Dr. Jignesh Gandhi, Dr. Vivek Bindal, Dr. Raju Easwaran Dr. Jhanvi Bajaj, Dr. Zainab Vora, Dr. Raina Chawla and many more leading clinicians and surgeons have come together on one single platform to create content that is coherent, current and clear i.e. conceptual - as the aim is not to live forever but to leave behind a legacy that lives forever

Through the App, we've endeavored to establish "A National Classroom," ensuring knowledge dissemination to every student, without constraints on numbers or selection criteria.

Our trainees can access top-notch teachers worldwide through their cell phones anytime, anywhere, at their convenience.

eConceptual App provides:

- Video Lectures on Clinical Examination and Demonstration
- In-App Notes
- Question Bank to practice MCQs
- Regular In-App Live Sessions
- Mentorship Sessions
- Books authored by eConceptual Faculty
- Live MCQ Discussions
- Have access to the best medical educational learning content
- Gather step-by-step simulations of surgeries, procedures & techniques performed by the Legends
- Get the best case notes for theory exams
- HD online video lectures
- Important case discussion by the legends
- Free download with purchasable educational packs available

Conceptual Orthopedics, Conceptual Surgery, Conceptual Anesthesia, Conceptual Radiology, and Conceptual OBG are hosted on the eConceptual app.

The aim behind eConceptual is to provide standard training to MS/ DNB Resident Doctors enthusiastic to understand clinical & surgical skills right from THE BASICS, building strong concepts and keeping them abreast with recent advances.

To provide you with the best training, the biggest legends, leading clinicians & surgeons with excellent academic backgrounds have come together to share the most valuable assets - their knowledge, experience, and achievements earned over years of dedicated Clinical and Surgical practice.

Distinguished educators like Prof. Dr. S.M. Tuli, Prof. Dr. Sudhir Kumar, Prof. Dr. Anil Dhal, Prof. Dr. Shantharam Shetty, Prof. Dr. V.B. Bhasin, Prof. Dr. Arun Kakar, Prof. Dr. R C M Kaza, Prof Dr. Vinod Malik, Prof Dr. Satish Aggarwal, Prof. Dr. Rakesh Garg, Dr. Geeta Kadayaprath, Dr. Jignesh Gandhi, Dr. Vivek Bindal, Dr. Raju Easwaran Dr. Jhanvi Bajaj, Dr. Zainab Vora, Dr. Raina Chawla and many more leading clinicians and surgeons have come together on one single platform to create content that is coherent, current and clear i.e. conceptual - as the aim is not to live forever but to leave behind a legacy that lives forever

summary: eConceptual: Conceptual Orthopedics, Anesthesia, Surgery, Radiology and OBG
